title: Live at the historic Belmont! Beautiful classic studios available!
posting_body: ['Come live at the historic Belmont Apartments!', 'Beautiful, spacious studio apartments are now available at the Belmont!', 'This wonderful 1920s era building is one block off Hennepin and a few block walk to Lake of the Isles or a short bike-ride to Bde Maka Ska!', 'Live at the crossroads of the city, a ten minute drive from everywhere you want to be!', "Located where Lowry Hill and Uptown meet, you will have easy access to the area's amenities while being close by the wonderful lakes of south Minneapolis.", 'Visit our website to learn more at <URL>.', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a viewing.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', '_____________________________________________________________________________', 'Living room', 'Full bath', 'Closets', 'Stove / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable-ready', 'Fiber Optic Available', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', '_____________________________________________________________________________', 'Controlled access', 'Bus line quick walk away', 'Professionally managed', 'On-site credit/debit card operated laundry facilities', 'LEASE TERMS', '_____________________________________________________________________________', 'Managed and maintained by Hornig Companies, Inc.', 'Apply on-site at the Belmont', '12-month lease length', '*Images are representative of unit, but may not be actual unit.']
